医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基因组编辑成为焦点：遗传性疾病携带者的观点塑造了对话研究探讨了体细胞基因组编辑的应用前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Genome-editing-in-the-spotlight-genic-disorder-carriers-views-shape-the-conversation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Genome-editing-in-the-spotlight-genic-disorder-carriers-views-shape-the-conversation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c3f6a0c-b88b-4bd8-a61d-cdc574cfa721 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 04:09:00 -0400 Genome editing in the spotlight: genetic disorder carriers' views shape the conversation
年龄相关的脂质代谢变化对总体健康的影响科学家们详细概述了与年龄相关的脂质代谢变化及其与年龄相关慢性疾病的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Impact-of-age-lated-alterations-in-lipid-metabolism-on-general-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Impact-of-age-lated-alterations-in-lipid-metabolism-on-general-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c54d9541-51bd-4831-9c97-695eb034c6dc Tue, 08 Aug 2023 03:01:00 -0400 Impact of age-related alterations in lipid metabolism on general health
体育锻炼可降低因镉暴露而导致睡眠障碍的风险研究人员检查了血镉暴露、体力活​​动和睡眠障碍之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Physical-exercise-mitigates-risk-of-sleep-disturbances-due-to-cadmium-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Physical-exercise-mitigates-risk-of-sleep-disturbances-due-to-cadmium-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65a6369b-9ddf-4d15-a044-c574c614e87d Tue, 08 Aug 2023 02:49:00 -0400 Physical exercise mitigates risk of sleep disturbances due to cadmium exposure
COVID-19 大流行如何影响少数族裔社区的健康行为研究人员对 COVID-19 大流行对英国黑人、亚洲人和少数民族社区的影响进行了分类和评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/How-the-COVID-19-pandemic-affected-health-behaviors-among-minority-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/How-the-COVID-19-pandemic-affected-health-behaviors-among-minority-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f68e24b2-bd74-4cf4-95e7-97d8b76c9d0c Tue, 08 Aug 2023 02:44:00 -0400 How the COVID-19 pandemic affected health behaviors among minority communities
SLU 研究发现老年人焦虑症、苯二氮卓类药物暴露与痴呆症之间存在联系圣路易斯大学医学院的研究发现，在 65 岁及以上的患者中，焦虑症的诊断与痴呆症诊断风险增加显着相关，而苯二氮卓类药物暴露与痴呆症风险增加 28% 相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/SLU-research-finds-link- Between-anxiety-disorders-苯并二氮杂卓-exposure-and-dementia-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/SLU-research-finds-link- Between-anxiety-disorders-Benzdiazepine-exposure-and-dementia-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2978520c-9767-4a64-acfb-9d1583d6563b Mon, 07 Aug 2023 23:57:57 -0400 SLU research finds link between anxiety disorders, benzodiazepine exposure and dementia in seniors
剑桥科学家发现超重和肥胖者下丘脑的结构差异剑桥科学家表明，下丘脑是大脑中控制食欲的关键区域，与健康体重的人相比，超重和肥胖者的大脑有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Cambridge-scientists-find-structural-differences-in-hypothalamus-of-overweight-and-obese-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Cambridge-scientists-find-structural-differences-in-hypothalamus-of-overweight-and-obese-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd41c818-ca6d-49d3-beb4-b3a08258c563 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 23:47:00 -0400 Cambridge scientists find structural differences in hypothalamus of overweight and obese people
密歇根大学和 Zingerman 启动试点计划，培训员工使用纳洛酮为了扩大挽救生命的阿片类药物过量逆转药物的使用，密歇根大学和安娜堡的 Zingerman 商业社区正在密歇根州启动一项以餐厅为基础的试点计划，以培训员工如何使用和管理纳洛酮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/University-of-Michigan-and-Zingermans-launch-pilot-program-to-train-employees-in-use-of-naloxone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/University-of-Michigan-and-Zingermans-launch-pilot-program-to-train-employees-in-use-of-naloxone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2e2e495-1fd5-40da-b0df-f86b495be18d Mon, 07 Aug 2023 23:36:02 -0400 University of Michigan and Zingerman's launch pilot program to train employees in use of naloxone
区域气候变化导致危及生命的人畜共患疾病爆发巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 领导的一项研究显示，多囊包虫病是一种危及生命的人畜共患疾病，其爆发是由区域气候变化造成的。该研究所由“la Caixa”基金会支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Regional-climate-changes-drive-life-throne-zoonotic-disease-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Regional-climate-changes-drive-life-throne-zoonotic-disease-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=218739cb-ba55-4e64-b565-6d23db2ab159 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 23:26:43 -0400 Regional climate changes drive life-threatening zoonotic disease outbreaks
基于人工智能的预测工具可以帮助指导癌症治疗丹娜—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员创建了一种基于人工智能的工具，该工具使用肿瘤基因测序数据来预测患者癌症的主要来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/AI-based-predictive-tool-could-help-guide-treatment-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/AI-based-predictive-tool-could-help-guide-treatment-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d965e31-50fd-46cf-8e05-7c7193f94a51 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 23:20:22 -0400 AI-based predictive tool could help guide treatment of cancer
研究人员开发出监测循环休克危重患者的新方法循环休克的危重患者；当心脏无法向身体其他部位输送足够的血液和氧气时，通常是由于心力衰竭、败血症或出血；需要密切监测和治疗，特别是保持足够的血压，以防止重要器官受伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Researchers-develop-new-method-for-monitoring-riticly-ill-病人-with-circulatory-shock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Researchers-develop-new-method-for-monitoring-riticly-ill-病人-with-circulatory-shock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3295e50a-3c7a-4e25-adc1-1a7ded8244dd Mon, 07 Aug 2023 23:14:37 -0400 Researchers develop new method for monitoring critically ill patients with circulatory shock
